actions.name: Flaming Hand Scythe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage and 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Fiendish Blink (1/Day)
actions.desc: The gumienniki flashes its glowing eyes, illuminating a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area that can see the gumienniki must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be blinded for 1 minute.

special_abilities.name: Shapechanger
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the gumienniki can change its form into a Tiny housecat, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form except it loses its flaming hand scythe attack when in cat form.

special_abilities.name: Through Grass and Sheaves
special_abilities.desc: The gumienniki's speed is doubled when traveling over grassy areas or through planted crops.
